title: ON AIR
description: In connection with Ohio Hockey Digest, current Ohio high school hockey coaches Tim Sullivan and Jason Levanduski bring their ideas and opinions to the masses of the great state of Ohio.  The Ohio Hockey Digest On Air Podcast will focus on the greatest game going and all levels of hockey being played across the state, but also touching on pop culture, interviews, and other entertainment. Growing the game of hockey the best they can in the state of Ohio.  If you don’t know, they will make you know! Produced by Daniel Humphrey.  New episodes released every Friday.

title: The Draft Board
description:
The Draft Board is a new podcast launched and hosted by two Calgarians from different backgrounds who are united by their passion for sport. Listen in as freelance sports journalist David Song and lifelong hockey player Tyson Warkentin discuss relevant topics in the world of football, hockey and basketball.

Here on The Draft Board, our goal is to provide listeners with in-depth content that goes beyond (and is not afraid to question) the narratives commonly found in mainstream sports media outlets. If you'd like to join a conversation that unpacks your favourite athletic topics and events in insightful new ways, then take your seat and join us for the ride!

title: Hockey Press Pass
description:
Hosted by longtime NHL and NWHL PR executive and New York Times Hockey writer Chris Botta, the Hockey Press Pass Podcast shines a light on the hockey media like never before.

Each week, Chris speaks with leading broadcasters, writers and executives around the NHL and all areas of hockey.  We will learn about how they got here, their process, their triumphs and challenges. And every so often at the end of the show, Chris shares some of his experiences as Communications VP of the New York Islanders, and from his days and nights on the hockey beat. 

Whether you’re a dedicated and knowledgeable fan, interested in a career in sports or even just in what goes on behind the curtain, Hockey Press Pass is for you. Presented by InStat Hockey.

title: The Couch Podcast Network
description: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Couch Podcast Network. A safe place for you to come and listen to multiple shows on one feed that cover a wide range of sports and sports topics. If you miss those heated arguments that you have with your friends and family on the couch over sports, then you have come to the right place. With multiple different shows on one feed you are sure to find something you like. The couch show offers rotating hosts and guests who cover NBA, NFL, CFB, sports betting, and MLB analysis and segments, as well as coaching segments, where coaches from various college programs come on to break down X’s and O’s from their respective sports. For the UFC and MMA fans, there is the Uppercut podcast, where a trio of cousins (Mikey, Jeff and Max) interview professional UFC and MMA fighters, and preview and review every single UFC card, giving the picks and breaking down what happened and what they think will happen. For fantasy fiends, we have the Benchwarmers podcast, where Steven and Fantasy Football expert Ben discuss the most important moves and news you need to win your fantasy league. So, give us a chance, I think you will find something to like here, and as always have yourself a wonderful day! Link to all Socials, and Listening Options: https://linktr.ee/the.couch.podcast
author_name: Max Lubelczyk, Jordan Dyer, Peyton Gravell, Michael Miller, Jeff Huston, Connor Butts, Alex Zwickau, Ryan Ledwith, and Steven Watson

title: 1973 Podcast
description:
Welcome to the "1973 Podcast"!

Step back in time and join us as we journey through life with the wisdom and experiences of three friends who were born in the iconic year of 1973. If you're a part of the Generation X crowd or simply curious about the 70s, this podcast is tailor-made for you.

Join your hosts – "Your Hockey Hero," "The Professor," and "Mouth of the South" – as they bring you a unique and engaging perspective on the world. With half a century of life under their belts, they're here to share their insights, anecdotes, and observations on everything that has shaped our world.

Main Topics and Themes:

Dive into a variety of captivating subjects that have kept these lifelong friends engaged and intrigued:

🏒 Hockey: Whether it's reminiscing about classic games, analyzing the current state of the NHL, or sharing personal hockey stories, you'll get your fill of puck talk.

🤼 Pro Wrestling: Step into the squared circle as the hosts relive legendary matches, discuss the evolution of wrestling, and offer a ringside seat to their favorite moments.

📺 Pop Culture: From the music and movies that defined the era to the cultural shifts that continue to influence us today, explore the world of pop culture through the lens of the 70s.

Tone and Style:

Expect lively conversations, hearty laughs, and unfiltered opinions as these friends come together in a casual and conversational setting. You'll feel like you're hanging out with them, sharing stories and insights over your favorite drinks.

Special Features and Unique Selling Points:

What sets the "1973 Podcast" apart is the authentic and relatable perspective these hosts bring. They're not just pundits – they're real guys who've lived through it all. Get ready for a nostalgic trip down memory lane with individuals who've been there, done that, and are excited to share their journey with you.

Join Us:

Tune in weekly to catch a new episode where "Your Hockey Hero," "The Professor," and "Mouth of the South" take you on a captivating ride through their unique perspectives on hockey, pro wrestling, pop culture, and life in general.

So, if you're a fellow child of the 70s or simply intrigued by the Generation X experience, hit that subscribe button and get ready to be entertained, enlightened, and immersed in the world of the "1973 Podcast"!

title: The Faceoff Podcast
description: A hockey podcast with news,takes and fun games

title: De Platte Driehoek
description:
Of je nu een doorgewinterde hockeyfan bent of gewoon nieuwsgierig naar wat er gaande is in de wereld van de bal en de stick, Max en Thijs hebben je gedekt. Elke week lullen over hockey en andere zaken, van snelle rushes tot verbluffende saves, van schijnbewegingen die je hart sneller doen kloppen tot teamwork dat je kippenvel bezorgt. Ze bekijken niet alleen de actie, maar delen ook inzichten, grappige anekdotes en vooruitzichten voor het volgende hockeyweekend.

Mis geen enkel moment van de platte driehoek – de perfecte balans tussen snelheid, precisie en teamwerk. Abonneer je op "De Platte Driehoek" en laat Max en Thijs je meenemen op een geweldige reis door de wereld van (hockey)hoogtepunten!

Volg ons op sociale media en deel je eigen hoogtepunten met de hashtag #DePlatteDriehoek. Luister, geniet en blijf op de hoogte van alles wat er gaande is binnen en buiten de spannende wereld van het hockey!

title: Biscuits and Gravy Podcast
description: All things hockey from high school to the NHL
